entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
